spell.name: Windwright's Intuition
entries: You call upon your dragonmark's power to enable swift travel. When you Cast the Spell, you Stride, Tumble Through, or Pilot (as a one- or two-action activity) for an air or water vehicle. You gain a +1 status bonus to the skill used for the roll or to AC if your movement triggers a reaction. The bonus is applied any time you take one of the action, as long as you Sustain the Spell.

3: You do not need to sustain Windwright's Intuition

spell.name: Lesser Stormbringer

frequency.entry: Once per day --- even if you have the focus point to cast it

entries: With a concentrated effort to bend the powers of your mark, you replicate the effects of a spell. When you begin to cast Lesser Stormbringer, you choose to replicate Gust of Wind, Personal Rain Cloud, or Obscuring Mist. Lesser Stormbringer gains the traits of the selected spell, then you may replicate the spell's effect by completing the Cast a Spell activity using the normal number of actions for it. The replicated spell is automatically heightened to the level of Lesser Stormbringer.
You ignore any trivial material or verbal components of the replicated spell, but if the replicated spell requires a focus or material cost, you must still provide it to cast it.

dragonmark.greater: You may cast Lesser Stormbringer up to two times per daily preparation.
dragonmark.grand: You may cast Lesser Stormbringer up to three times per daily preparation.
dragonmark.siberys: You may cast Lesser Stormbringer any number of times per daily preparation.
